description: Learn how to make this gnocchi recipe with a creamy sweet potato and sage sauce. Ready in 30 minutes and packed with veg, it'll be your new midweek go-to.
name: Gnocchi with Sweet Potato Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add gnocchi to the pan and toss to coat, fold through ricotta and sprinkle with parmesan to serve.
